meanings.definition: A person who participates in or attends races at a racetrack.
meanings.sent1: The racetrackers cheered loudly as the horses crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent2: Many racetrackers enjoy the thrill of watching horse races.
meanings.sent3: The racetrackers joked about having a race on foot instead of horses.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, successful entrepreneurs are like skilled racetrackers.
meanings.sent5: The racetrackers' excitement was palpable as they awaited the start of the race.
